Chijioke J., we've been helping 12 of the UN's SDG's through our creative approach to making the world a better place. Would you be opposed to connecting to learn how we do this?

Hey Chijioke J., So sorry for the delay in getting back to you.

We've just been offered an opportunity to present to the President of Kenya so we've all been putting everything together to make sure we make as much traction as possible.

Do you think I could ask that we catch up on a quick Zoom? The calendar is below:
calendly.com/wemakeimpact

Looking forward to meeting you!

We Make Impact

Call with Jimi - We Make Impact
calendly.com • 1 min read
OCT 24, 2022
View Jo’s profileJo Peninsulas
Jo Peninsulas 12:19 AM
Hi Chijioke J., 

I hope this finds you well.

I wanted to share an interesting article from our Founder, Isaac Cohen, about creating a For-Good-Economy. I particularly found the creative ways to attach a for-good angle to generate more revenue, and at the same time, make the world a better place.

4-minute read - let me know what you think.

Best regards,
Jo 

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/for-good-economy-its-good-business-do-isaac-cohen-?trk=public\_profile\_article\_view
One Earth | One Life profile image
One Earth | One Life

A For-Good Economy: It’s Good Business to do Good in Business
Isaac Cohen 🌱 on LinkedIn • 3 min read

DEC 22, 2022

Hey Chijioke J., I hope you're having a lovely time during the holiday season.

We've created a group for equatorial project leaders to share their projects and successes so that we can all do our best to reach the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.

I wanted to send you some information via cjevoh@gmail.com - would you mind?

I'd really value your feedback and support in making this group active and productive.

Maybe you could join the group and help us reverse the negative effects of climate change... here's the info:

https://www.linkedin.com/groups/12747681/
Our Equator
Our Equator
